title: IdiotCoder
author: IdiotCoder
created_time: July 18, 2023, 07:52:37 PMLast edit: July 20, 2023, 12:09:47 AM by IdiotCoder
content: I am a full stack developer with experience Laravel, Vuejs jQuery, Tailwind and Bootstrap. I have some experience with Angular/Node. I am a fast learner and can pick up new programming languages easy. I use version control (Git) to track code and revert back to old of if needed. I am experienced with both unit and feature testing.Since I am still establishing myself, I will develop a reasonably large web application for $50. I am working on some portfolio projects, so if you want to see them, PM me. I will work hard to deliver your website.Thanks. EDIT:Here is a Tailwind projecthttp://support-tommorison.comLaravel/Vue applicationhttp://blog.support-tommorison.com

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: IdiotCoder on July 18, 2023, 07:52:37 PMSince I am still establishing myself, I will develop a reasonably large web application for $50. I am working on some portfolio projects, so if you want to see them, PM me. I will work hard to deliver your website.Send me a link to your portfolio, maybe you can use it if you meet some criteria. You can through PM here.
